author: ehillenius
msg: fixed a problem with trailing slashes and homepage. Doesn't seem that the && check on servletpath was needed anyway.

author: jdonnerstag
msg: RFE [ 1249907 ] add ${label} as a validator message variable

- added get/setLabel to FormComponent. The "label" does have no meaning to the form component. It'll only be forwarded into the attached validators ognl model and be available like ${label} within messages

- Default validator messages are now supported. They are used in case no formComponent specific property can be found. The key must be equals to the simple class name of the validator (e.g. RequiredValidator=...)
- modified the FormInput example to make use of these new features
